org.webrtc

Class EglBase14

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.webrtc.EglBase
      • org.webrtc.EglBase14

  • public final class EglBase14
extends EglBase
    Holds EGL state and utility methods for handling an EGL14 EGLContext, an EGLDisplay, and an EGLSurface.
